short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically set HD quality for Twitch™ streams.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AutoHD for Twitch™

AutoHD for Twitch™ lets you set your preferred video resolution on Twitch™ streams, with an option to prioritize higher frame rates for smoother viewing. Whether you’re watching directly on Twitch™ or through embedded streams on other websites, AutoHD for Twitch™ applies your resolution and frame rate preferences automatically, ensuring a consistent viewing experience every time.

Please note: AutoHD for Twitch™ is an independent project and is not affiliated with or endorsed by Twitch Interactive, Inc. All trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
